about_the_game:
Welcome to "OuPaiWar2: The Cabin by Hua's Lake"! Step into this unique and strategic game where you'll embark on a journey of farm-building and adventure in a mysterious and beautiful world

Purchase Plots and Build Your Farm

You can purchase various plots around Hua's Lake, from fertile farmlands to dense forests, and begin your grand construction plans. Each piece of land has unique resources and potential, waiting for you to develop. You can build farms, grow crops, raise animals, and utilize the abundant natural resources to expand your homestead.

Draw Cards and Strategic Battles

In this game, cards are your key to battle and development. You can draw cards to gain powerful skills and resources, and use these cards to defeat enemies. Each card has unique effects and uses, requiring you to flexibly use strategies and cleverly combine your deck to achieve victory in fierce battles.

Features and Content

  • Diverse Plot Choices: Various types of plots waiting for your exploration and development.

  • Card Strategy Battles: Versatile card combinations, strategy at its finest.

  • Unique Building System: Build and manage your farm, developing a prosperous homestead.

Join "Operation Oppai 2: The Cabin by Hua's Lake" and experience a new level of fun combining building and strategy!

content_descriptors.notes: Our game contains some content featuring female characters in revealing attire. These characters are designed with outfits that may be considered provocative or suggestive. This content is intended to enhance the visual style and thematic elements of the game. We have taken care to ensure that these depictions are tasteful and align with the overall artistic direction of the game.
